subject: Rugby (Game)
lead_paragraph: The 30-3 defeat was doubly devastating for England. It is the sixth time in 15 seasons that it has come to the final match seeking a Grand Slam, and the fifth time it has fallen short.
snippet: The 30-3 defeat was doubly devastating for England. It is the sixth time in 15 seasons that it has come to the final match seeking a Grand Slam, and the fifth time it has fallen short.
